Class ServiceServerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nise.ux.asl.run.ServiceServerBuilder

  • public class ServiceServerBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Main Constructor Class of this service library. To use this library create an instance of this class, then use create() to start the service
